short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly collaborate visually on any website. Streamline feedback, prioritize tasks, and manage projects with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The leading bug reporting and website commenting solution. Report bugs, share design feedback, iterate on copy, and more – all just a single click away, directly in Chrome. 

Meet Atarim – the modern standard for design communication. Like sticky notes on a webpage, your product UI, or ad creative, but better. 

🫵 Effortlessly give and receive feedback with a simple point and click.

💡 Extremely intuitive, perfect for non-technical users.

🗄 Organize and manage tasks directly in your browser. 

⏰ Save time by reducing back-and-forth emails between teams.

🔗 Share and collaborate on tasks with clients and remote team members seamlessly.

All with Atarim. It’s never been easier to get on the same page and work together.
 
Stop trying to decipher what people are trying to say – get all the context you need, including automated screenshots, whenever someone creates a task.

Atarim also integrates with all the tools you already use (Jira, Slack, Asana, and more) so you can send bug reports and new tasks exactly where your team needs them.
